title: The Friday Morning Conversation: Jon Pardi on his new single + Fun Fact Friday with One Debatable Fact + Easy Trivia
itunes:title: The Friday Morning Conversation: Jon Pardi on his new single + Fun Fact Friday with One Debatable Fact + Easy Trivia
description:
Jon Pardi stops by to talk about his new single “Last Night Lonley”, taking acting classes and the show he audition for. We also talk about his new whiskey and when his new album is coming out. Amy shares her Top 5 Fun Facts of the week and we debate if one of them is actually fun. We played another round of Easy Trivia after Amy had a big win last week!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
